candidate3.name: Kari Lake
candidate3.patternDescription: Consistently opposes scientific consensus, particularly on vaccines and climate change.

statements.quote: They want someone who's going to protect their kids from these new forced shots that the CDC is recommending in order for our children to be able to go to school.
statements.context: Fox News interview with Laura Ingraham

statements.quote: We're not going to force our precious, healthy children to get a shot that is already proving to be not only ineffective, it's also proving to be dangerous.
statements.context: Response to CDC vaccine recommendations for children

statements.quote: Absolutely not. We will NEVER allow that in Arizona. This is an experimental shot. Our children are not guinea pigs.
statements.context: Response to reporter question about mandatory COVID vaccines

statements.quote: When I'm Governor, the Covid Vax will NEVER be mandatory for our precious children.

I have noticed a lot of people I know who are vaccinated have come down with it. So it makes me wonder about the efficacy of the vaccine... I'm not believing a lot of the science, so-called science coming out of some of our so-called experts.
statements.context: Local radio interview questioning vaccine efficacy

statements.quote: The COVID vaccine is a nightmare that will NEVER stop.
We need to pass some legislation to save people from these vaccine mandates and make it easier for us to get these lifesaving drugs [hydroxychloroquine and ivermectin].
statements.context: Private retirees event discussing alternative treatments

statements.quote: When I'm governor, there will be no more COVID closures, no more masks on our beautiful children's faces, and we will not require our children to have a COVID shot.

Lake outlined her education plan saying she would ban mask mandates, COVID-19 vaccine requirements and the teaching of critical race theory while clarifying she would not move to eliminate the vaccine requirements that were in place long before the coronavirus outbreak.

statements.quote: Take the mask and shove it. As governor she would not tolerate mask and vaccine mandates.
